original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Avalokiteśvara Hayagrīva

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
analyzed: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

original: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /

original: bo dhi satv'a ya /🔽ma h'a satv'a ya /
analyzed: bo dhi satv'a ya / ma h'a satv'a ya /

original: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
analyzed: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /

original: sarba satve bhya: sa n'a ga ti ne /
analyzed: sarba satve bhya: sa n'a ga ti ne /
translated: the Protector of all beings.🔽Homage to the One who is the Destroyer of all Evil.

original: na ma: sarbba satve bya: sa na aa sa ba ha ri ni; na ma: sarbba satv'a bha yodta ra n'a ya /🔽na ma: sarbba bha ba pra sha ma na na ka r'a ya /🔽na ma: sarba sadzva bo dhi tsi ki ta sa na ka r'a ya /
analyzed: na ma: sarbba satve bya: sa na aa sa ba ha ri ni; na ma: sarbba satv'a bha yodta ra n'a ya / na ma: sarbba bha ba pra sha ma na na ka r'a ya / na ma: sarba sadzva bo dhi tsi ki ta sa na ka r'a ya /
translated: Homage to the One who is the Pacifier of all Existences.🔽Homage to the One who is the Bestower of all Bodhisattva Vows.

original: na ma: sarbba bandha na /🔽tstshe da na ka r'a ya /🔽na ma: @28a *//
analyzed: na ma: sarbba bandha na / tstshe da na ka r'a ya / na ma: @28a *//
translated: Homage to the One who is the Liberator of all Beings.🔽Homage to the One who is the Destroyer of all Bonds.

original: sarbba du; kha ra mo kasha na ka r'a ya /
analyzed: sarbba du; kha ra mo kasha na ka r'a ya /
translated: Homage to the One who is the Destroyer of all Karmic Obscurations.

original: na ma: sarbba aandha ka ra bi dha ma na ka r'a ya /

original: ma h'a yo g'a yo g'i shva r'a ya te syana ma kri tv'a ai dam a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra mu kho tg'i rnam ri shi bid d'a de ba n'a ga /
analyzed: ma h'a yo g'a yo g'i shva r'a ya te syana ma kri tv'a ai dam a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra mu kho tg'i rnam ri shi bid d'a de ba n'a ga /
translated: Maha-yoga-yogeshvara-ya te syanam kritva aham arya avalokiteshvara mukha-agata-ri shi vidada deva-naga.
